data_quality_issues.name: Incomplete Data
data_quality_issues.definition: Missing or partial data fields due to entry errors or collection issues

data_quality_issues.name: Inaccurate Data
data_quality_issues.definition: Errors or inconsistencies in data values from human error or integration issues

data_quality_issues.name: Duplicate Data
data_quality_issues.definition: Repeated records causing redundancy from multiple sources or incomplete cleaning

data_quality_issues.name: Inconsistent Data
data_quality_issues.definition: Lack of uniformity in format or structure across records

data_quality_issues.name: Invalid Data
data_quality_issues.definition: Data not conforming to validation rules or integrity checks

data_quality_issues.name: Outdated Data
data_quality_issues.definition: Non-current information that no longer reflects reality

data_quality_issues.name: Biased Data
data_quality_issues.definition: Skewed data representation due to sampling errors or systemic inequalities

data_quality_issues.name: Data Security and Privacy Issues
data_quality_issues.definition: Concerns about data protection, confidentiality, and regulatory compliance
